attributes.action: All ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS To Be Sent Back To Their Own Country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too Many Illegal immigrants are coming over and making britain get too crowded, also all our jobs are being taken by them for cheap labour and it isnt fair on homeless people, also if they can't speak our language then how do they communicate with us?

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
